ChunkText: please remember that you do not need a valid visa to remain the US your visa only allows you to enter the us. while you are here, your I-20 maintains your immigration status, not your visa.
ContextBefore: you still need to apply for a visa stamp, but do not have to sit for another interview. please check your specific embassys website to see if this is an option at the embassy where you plan to apply for a visa. this is typically called a visa interview waiver.
ContextAfter: where to apply for a new f-1 visa most students can apply for a new f-1 visa at any US embassy around the world, and are not limited to the embassies in their own country.
